mapper.delete: DELETE FROM agile_issue_link WHERE issue_id = #{issueId} OR linked_issue_id = #{issueId}
mapper.select: SELECT ail.*, ailt.link_name AS linkTypeName, ailt.in_ward AS ward, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, ai.summary, ai.priority_code, ais.NAME, abc.color_code FROM agile_issue_link ail LEFT JOIN agile_issue_link_type ailt ON ailt.link_type_id = ail.link_type_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai ON ail.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue_status ais ON ais.id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_board_column abc ON abc.category_code = ais.category_code WHERE ail.issue_id = #{issueId} AND ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.type_code != 'sub_task' ORDER BY ailt.link_name

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ail.*, ailt.link_name AS link_type_name, ailt.out_ward AS ward, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, ai.summary, ai.priority_code, ais.NAME, ais.category_code AS status_code, ai.type_code FROM agile_issue_link ail LEFT JOIN agile_issue_link_type ailt ON ailt.link_type_id = ail.link_type_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai ON ail.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue_status ais ON ais.id = ai.issue_id WHERE ail.issue_id = #{issueId} AND ai.project_id = #{projectId} UNION ALL SELECT ail1.*, ailt1.link_name AS link_type_name, ailt1.in_ward AS ward, CONCAT_WS('-', api1.project_code, ai1.issue_num) AS issue_num, ai1.summary, ai1.priority_code, ais1.NAME, ais1.category_code AS status_code, ai1.type_code FROM agile_issue_link ail1 LEFT JOIN agile_issue_link_type ailt1 ON ailt1.link_type_id = ail1.link_type_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai1 ON ail1.issue_id = ai1.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api1 ON api1.project_id = ai1.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue_status ais1 ON ais1.id = ai1.issue_id WHERE ail1.linked_issue_id = #{issueId} AND ai1.project_id = #{projectId} ) a ORDER BY a.link_type_name
